title: Kimi ga Otona ni Naru Mae ni
sinopse:
1-2. Kimi ga Otona ni Naru Mae ni (Before You Become an Adult)
3-4. Ii Otoko ni wa Himitsu ga Aru (The Secret to a Good Guy) 5. Sekai de Ichiban Nagaiyo no Tabi (Journey of the Longest Night in the World) 6. Sensei no List (Teacher's List) 7. Nagai Shuumatsu (Long Weekend)
